name: @saekitominaga/customelements-button-checkboxes-ctrl
description: Button to check / uncheck all checkboxes by Custom Elements.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.js -- brotlin compress dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.js -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.js -- terser dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.js -o dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.min.esm.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.js,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.min.esm.js -- brotlin compress dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.min.esm.js -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:dts-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.d.ts -- cpy dist/ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.esm.d.ts dist --rename=ButtonCheckboxesCtrl.min.esm.d.ts

author: Saeki Tominaga
